mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, OPEN_DEPART, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{openDepart}, #{filePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO , N.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME as memberName , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , N.CLICK_NO , N.FILE_PATH , N.CATEGORY , N.EMERGENCY_YN , N.OPEN_DEPART , N.ENROLL_DATE , N.UPDATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY = NC.CATEGORY_NO WHERE N.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND M.COMPANY_NO = ( SELECT COMPANY_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE NO = #{loginMemberNo} )
SELECT NOTICE_NO , MEMBER_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , CLICK_NO , FILE_PATH , CATEGORY , EMERGENCY_YN , OPEN_DEPART , ENROLL_DATE , UPDATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET CLICK_NO = CLICK_NO+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}

UPDATE NOTICE SET
TITLE = #{title},
CONTENT = #{content},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath},
CATEGORY = #{category},
OPEN_DEPART = #{openDepart},
UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
